summary: This is my little pet project so far I have built a good amount of the parts that I want to be put into this add on. I am currently seeking help in any form or fashion, considering I am still learning all that there is to learn about modding Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
_____________________________________
I AM CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR HELP!!!
_____________________________________
I need help from any of the following:
-Level Design
-Concept Design
-Model Design
-Texture Design
-Voice Acting
-Writers

If you feel interested in helping this project, as I would love to see it turn into something quite large, please feel free to send me a message here or email me with details at: aceofspades1305@gmail.com

THANKS IN ADVANCE!!!
____________________________________________________________________________________________


This is my little pet project so far I have built a good amount of the parts that I want to be put into this add on. I am currently seeking help in any form or fashion, considering I am still learning all that there is to learn about modding Skyrim.
---------------------------------------------
How to get to Restitution
---------------------------------------------
You can enter Restitution by the gate just before Chillfurrow Farm near Whiterun or by hitting the console command (~) and typing \"coc RestitutionStart\" without the quotations.
----------------------------------------------
Things Completed
----------------------------------------------
3/4 Of the Island
Entry hall
Throne Room (Great Hall)

Things I Would Like To Do
------------------------------------------
-I would like to add a short quest that involves passing four trials, Strength, Courage, Honor and Judgement. Each trial should be short, but challenging.
-I would also like to add a quest line involving the ship in the dock in some way or another. Something similar to the Moonpaths mod, maybe?
-Add and furnish rooms, including master. (Would like to figure out how to make an aquarium for the master bedroom as well, so if you have any ideas it would be much appreciated.) 
-Add training room, Alchemy room, Enchanting Room Blacksmith Room and Display room.
------------------------------------------------
How to Install
------------------------------------------------
Download with Nexus Mod Manager and install with mod manager
Or
Download and Unzip files into your Skyrim program folder, under Data. Then run Skyrim and choose \"Restitution\" as a data file.
------------------------------------------------

As I said this is a WIP mod and anything is up for alteration/removal. All ideas are very much appreciated, and any and all help would be wonderful! Please don\'t hesitate to contact me if you want to help out with this project!
author: Toxxic
